I can't get over these messages you guys are posting!  They are very clear =
and most make a lot of sense!!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Fran=
k Sumption<mailto:franks-boxes@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<=
mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2007 9:39 AM
 =
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Sweep Tuning of AM Radio Band -


  Yeah, it's =
just friggin' amazing! Very simple, easy to do, and clear voices 
  result =
with meaningful messages.



  Frank

  >random

apture could be a technical message.

ion Hertz =3D 1mhz =3D 1000khz, which
